# Appendix {.unnumbered}

\setcounter{table}{0}
\renewcommand{\thetable}{A\arabic{table}}

```{r appendix, include=TRUE, results="asis"}
# Load packages
library(papaja)
library(tidyverse)

# Print table of materials
read_tsv("materials/items.txt", col_types = cols()) %>%
  transmute(
    img = paste0("\\includegraphics[valign=c, scale=0.19]{../materials/unfamiliar/", item, ".png}"),
    item = as.character(item),
    match = paste(match_noun, match_verb),
    nonmatch = paste(nonmatch_noun, nonmatch_verb)
  ) %>%
  apa_table(
    col.names = c("", "\\#", "Matching keywords", "Non-matching keywords"),
    escape = FALSE,
    longtable = TRUE,
    caption = "Unfamiliar Object Stimuli\\smallskip"
  )
```
